body: It's still inappropriate to put `#ifdef` on this macro in headers. Then the header will preprocess differently depending on which compiler invocation calls it (if you build a cc file with or without the flag.)
body_html: It's still inappropriate to put #ifdef on this macro in headers. Then the header will preprocess differently depending on which compiler invocation calls it (if you build a cc file with or without the flag.)
body_text: It's still inappropriate to put #ifdef on this macro in headers. Then the header will preprocess differently depending on which compiler invocation calls it (if you build a cc file with or without the flag.)
